root@334eb1141252:/app# cat /etc/resolv.conf; tmux wait -S done
# Generated by Docker Engine.
# This file can be edited; Docker Engine will not make further changes once it
# has been modified.

nameserver 127.0.0.11
search local us-central1-c.c.memgpt-428419.internal c.memgpt-428419.internal google.internal
options edns0 trust-ad ndots:0

# Based on host file: '/etc/resolv.conf' (internal resolver)
# ExtServers: [192.0.2.1]
# Overrides: [nameservers]
# Option ndots from: internal
root@334eb1141252:/app# systemctl restart networking; tmux wait -S done
bash: systemctl: command not found
root@334eb1141252:/app# curl -I example.com; tmux wait -S done
curl: (6) Could not resolve host: -I example.com
root@334eb1141252:/app# ifconfig; tmux wait -S done
bash: ifconfig: command not found
root@334eb1141252:/app# curl -I http://example.com; tmux wait -S done
curl: (6) Could not resolve host: -I http://example.com
root@334eb1141252:/app# apt-get update; tmux wait -S done
E: Could not connect to archive.ubuntu.com
root@334eb1141252:/app# apt-get install -y inetutils-ping; tmux wait -S done
E: Could not connect to archive.ubuntu.com
root@334eb1141252:/app# ping -c 4 8.8.8.8; tmux wait -S done
bash: ping: command not found
root@334eb1141252:/app# curl -I http://example.com; tmux wait -S done
curl: (6) Could not resolve host: -I http://example.com
